name: Dinari NLY
description: The Dinari dShare token for Annaly Capital Management Inc. (NLY.d) is a 1:1 backed token that represents ownership of Annaly shares in a tokenized format. Each NLY.d token is fully collateralized by an equivalent Annaly share held securely in a transparent treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, NLY.d offers investors a modern way to access Annaly shares, with features such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and improved transferability. Dinariâ€™s mission is to democratize access to real-world financial assets, making investing in companies like Annaly Capital Management more accessible and efficient.
